name: EVIL CUPCAKE PLUSH - 9"
description:
AVAILABLE BY SPECIAL ORDER ONLY. SHIPS IN 8-12 WEEKS.

Spiked Fur, Fleece and Fiberfill

Every Evil Cupcake comes with a vinyl sticker and a hangtag of his story!

<i>This is Evil Cupcake! His life’s goal is to successfully infiltrate households around the world. Poison is his bliss.He fattens up hapless people everywhere, pumping them full of calories and additives. His power has corrupted him. Misery loves company and he just can’t stand for anyone to be happy. <i>

name: HEARTBOY PLUSH -  15"
description:
Every Heartboy comes with a vinyl sticker and a hangtag of his story!

15 inches

<i>This is Heartboy. He doesn’t want you to see how vulnerable he feels, so he puts on his best tough-guy exterior. He won’t let anyone get too close. It seems like no matter what, he’s always misunderstood. His heart has been ripped out and sewn back in too many times to count: He’s all torn up. He’s hurting so much that he may seem a little sore at first, but deep down, he’s a real doll... just be gentle with him. <i>

name: SAD GIRL PLUSH - 15"
description:
Sad Girl was Designed in Los Angeles, CA. Every Sad Girl comes with a vinyl sticker and a hangtag of her story!

Hot Pink Fleece and fiberfill

15 inches tall

<i>This is Sad Girl. She hasn’t always been sad, but lately she feels let down by everything and everyone. She doesn’t even remember how to feel happy again. She will definitely be skeptical of you at first, but give her a chance. She will prove to be the best friend you’ve ever had, and maybe, just maybe, by loving you, she can find happiness again. <i>

name: LITTLE MAN PLUSH - 15"
description:
Every Little Man comes with a vinyl sticker and a hangtag of his story!

Fleece and fiberfill

15 inches tall

<i>This is Little Man! Don’t let his size fool you! He is no joke. He’s tired of being pushed around by the powers that be and people who always think they know best. He used to be real sweet and innocent, but now he’s had enough: No more Mr Nice Guy. Deep inside he’s still a lover... just don’t try to keep him down. Since he’s taken on his new identity, he’s knocked out over 100 people that deserved it. Back off!<i>

name: BAGHEAD PLUSH - 15"
description:
15 inches Fleece, Fiberfill and Burlap

<i> This is Baghead. In Baghead's world, everything is going wrong. He's feeling so low, all he really wants to do is disappear. If sometimes happiness seems far away and the world feels like a very lonely place, then Baghead is your perfect friend. Be patient, and with a little time he'll give you love right back: He understands how you feel. <i>
